# Documentation

- Usage: `usage.md`
- 日本語: `README.ja.md`, `usage.ja.md`
- Publishing (Visual Studio Marketplace): `publishing.md`

## Auto-generated artifacts

These are generated by the extension (directory can be changed via settings):

- Test perspective tables: `docs/test-perspectives/`
- Test execution reports: `docs/test-execution-reports/`
- Strategy compliance reports (when issues remain after auto-fix): `docs/test-execution-reports/` (e.g., `compliance-report_*.md`)
